reviews.review_msg: Miranda has been my favourite prof at SFU. She is the most relatable teacher ever who is always there to help her students! I really enjoyed her teaching style as it was a combination of her lecturing, allowing class discussion, and showing videos which kept the class engaged. I highly recommend taking any courses with her in the future!

One of the best profs I've had in Beedie. Highly recommend her because she treats you like adults/professionals and her teaching style is reflective of a workplace. Her assignments aren't hard but time consuming . No exams for her class which is a plus.

Miranda was a fabulous professor! She did a great job getting to know her students and communicating the material. She was hilarious with her jokes and made the lectures really enjoyable. Make sure to participate and put 100% into your assignments. There are few assignments in the class so every mark counts!

Taking this class with Miranda was great! She is very approachable, caring, & committed.  She really made an effort to make the course relatable beyond the classroom walls with weekly discussions about current events.  Overall, I'm leaving the class with a solid picture of sustainability & a few projects I'm really proud of. Thank you Miranda!

You can definitely tell she cares about her students and encouraged questions in class. Assignments were not too difficult but were more time consuming than expected. Enjoyed this class and would recommend taking a class with her if you can.
I thought Miranda's class had a really good dynamic. It was three hours, but I always had fun in it. If you have the chance to take a course with her, I'd say you're in for a good time.
